name: Easy and Fun Sausage Pizza Rolls
author: Lovemeans88
summary: These are pizza rolls made with a few key ingredients that the whole family will love! They're easy and quick as well as fun to make; the kids will even help! Despite their smallish size, these pizza rolls are fairly filling and easy to eat!
ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or as needed
directions: Heat a skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir sausage until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes
Pour milk into a small bowl
Place 1 egg roll wrapper on a plate; top with 1 tablespoon each cooked sausage, spaghetti sauce, and shredded mozzarella cheese
Brush edges of wrapper with a light coating of milk
Fold sides over filling as if wrapping a small burrito
Repeat with remaining wrappers, sausage, spaghetti sauce, and mozzarella cheese
Heat the same skillet over medium heat; lightly coat with vegetable oil
Place 3 to 4 pizza rolls in the hot skillet
Cook until the rolls are browned on the bottom, about 1 minute; flip and cook 1 minute more
Repeat with remaining rolls, adding more oil to the skillet as necessary
